analyzed: sa tayā ananta rūpiṇyā ananta rūpaḥ ramāpatiḥ

analyzed: prasannaiḥ upadiṣṭa uru sat śāstra śravaṇa ādibhiḥ

analyzed: vedāḥ padāt varṇataḥ ca śabdataḥ svarataḥ tathā

analyzed: rajaḥ tamaḥ oṇavaḥ vyaktim yāsyanti eva tatas kramāt

translated: Thus, the parts born from the remaining directions and the path

The lords of the principles above the egg, according to the previously mentioned method,

analyzed: atas balena sarveṣām tāratamyam vivecitam

analyzed: sva uttamaiḥ bhinna jagataḥ viṣayīkaraṇe kṣamam

analyzed: na bhavet eka deśena jānanti ete na ca anyathā

analyzed: jaḍam ca acetanam vā api śiva ādyāḥ puṣkara antimāḥ

analyzed: aṇḍa antare bahis ca api tātvikāḥ bahu rūpataḥ

analyzed: anādi sarva jīvānām jñānam tat vividham matam

analyzed: sādhanena vyañjyamānam āmukti antam tatas param

analyzed: eka prakāram ajñānam rahitam sva uttama āśritāt

analyzed: jñānāt śataguṇa nyūna ṛm iśvare vā jagati alam

analyzed: ananta veda ukta guṇān viṣṇeḥ jānāti padmabhūḥ

analyzed: krameṇa eva śatam nyūna jñānam viṣṇoḥ upāsakāḥ

analyzed: prākṛta uprākṛta śarīra āśritasya ṛjoḥ sadā
translated: The natural one is always based on a natural or un-natural body,

analyzed: manasi anityam yat janyam punar punar api sphuṭam

analyzed: tad bāhye vṛtti rupam ca yathārtham sarvadā api ca

analyzed: teṣām pañcavidha jñānam kvacid eva na sarvadā

analyzed: daitya āveśa ādi śūnyāḥ te sadā durviṣaya ujjhitāḥ

analyzed: sākṣi indriyaiḥ saha api etat liṅga sūkṣma indriya āvṛtaiḥ

analyzed: tayā doṣa śūnyā sat yukti jā matiḥ

analyzed: yathārthā eva tathā veda śāstra artha śravaṇāt api

analyzed: tatva vyāpāra kāle tu svarūpa ucita śaktayaḥ

analyzed: yathā āgama samudbhūtam trividham parikīrtitam

analyzed: jñānam manaḥ samudbhūtam bāhya kāryam iti īritam

analyzed: yat pratyakṣa anumānam ca āgamaḥ tasya sādhanam

analyzed: kvacid yathārtham ayathārtham kvacid bhavet

analyzed: devadāsāḥ krama avarāḥ
